AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')

#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangDeptCd#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.CLUT_YR_MNTH , AA.CALC_SEVE_PSN_BLGG_YR_MNTH , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_NM , NVL(AA.PYMT_SUBTN_INCM_TX_QNTY,0) AS PYMT_SUBTN_INCM_TX_QNTY , NVL(AA.PYMT_SUBTN_RGON_INCM_TX_QNTY,0) AS PYMT_SUBTN_RGON_INCM_TX_QNTY , NVL(AA.PYMT_SUBTN_FARVIL_SPCL_QNTY,0) AS PYMT_SUBTN_FARVIL_SPCL_QNTY , NVL(AA.PYMT_SUBTN_AGGR_SUM,0) AS PYMT_SUBTN_AGGR_SUM FROM (SELECT DPOB_CD ,CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PSN_BLGG_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , (3) AS ORD , ('차감원천징수세액') AS CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_NM , PYMT_SUBTN_INCM_TX_QNTY , PYMT_SUBTN_RGON_INCM_TX_QNTY , PYMT_SUBTN_FARVIL_SPCL_QNTY , PYMT_SUBTN_AGGR_SUM FROM REMT3100 UNION ALL SELECT DPOB_CD ,CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PSN_BLGG_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , (2) AS ORD , ('이연퇴직소득세') AS CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_NM , PYMT_TALC_INCM_TX_QNTY , PYMT_TALC_RGON_INCM_TX_QNTY , PYMT_TALC_FARVIL_SPCL_QNTY , PYMT_TX_ALLC_AGGR_SUM
FROM REMT3100 UNION ALL SELECT DPOB_CD ,CLUT_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PSN_BLGG_YR_MNTH , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , (1) AS ORD , ('신고대상세액') AS CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_NM , PYMT_REG_TGT_INCM_TX_QNTY , PYMT_REG_TGT_RGON_INCM_QNTY , PYMT_REG_TGT_FARVIL_SPCL_QNTY , PYMT_REGRST_TGT_AGGR_SUM FROM REMT3100) AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.CLUT_YR_MNTH=#clutYrMnth# AND AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )
